name: DoSolfachord Cutia
text: While you have an even Pendulum Scale in your Pendulum Zone, "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters you control gain ATK equal to 100 x their own Pendulum Scale. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Solfachord" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your hand, except "DoSolfachord Cutia". You can only use this effect of "DoSolfachord Cutia" once per turn.
pendulum_text:
Pendulum Summons of your "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters cannot be negated.
[ Monster Effect ] While you have an even Pendulum Scale in your Pendulum Zone, "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters you control gain ATK equal to 100 x their own Pendulum Scale. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Solfachord" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your hand, except "DoSolfachord Cutia". You can only use this effect of "DoSolfachord Cutia" once per turn.
